r.d:
This extension implements a Z39.50 client for PHP using the YAZ toolkit.
Find more information at: http://www.indexdata.dk/phpyaz/ http://www.indexdata.dk/yaz/
r.n: Added support for Z39.50 SearchResult-1 which is allows a client to get details about hit counts for parts of a query. Added support for new yaz_connect options, preferredMessageSize and maximumRecordSize.
